Reviews.Title: “Too tall for the bed”
Reviews.Author: kwoodRochester
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights march changed ownership offering deal season drum business pay bargain murphy bed fine solo adults 6 feet tall location 15 minute tram ride city center inconvienent visiting teh sites dinner beautiful setting teh canals world character coffee cafes amsterdam experience stay real bed staying extended time business night stay closer city center

Reviews.Content: booked hotel partner valentines weekend special london treat choice located brisk 10 minutes walk museum plein 25 minutes central amsterdam call suburbia hesitant wyndham recently property discovered lot locally restaurants cafes bakeries short stroll lovely lobby gorgeous fire winter loved definitely worth looking comfortable surroundings
